title: Magic of nature. No. 3. The Ladybird
brief_description: Aphids, one of the most common and destructive garden pests, do much damage each spring to growing plants. Their enemy is the tiny carniverous ladybird which consumes them in large numbers. The film, using close-up photography, records the 8-week life span of the ladybird.
